longInfo:
Admission and Transit Restrictions:
- Admission refused to nationals of Syria. 

Warning:
- Visitors will be refused entry if holding travel documents
  containing a visa (valid or expired) for Israel or any
  evidence of entry in Israel
vaccination:
Vaccination against yellow fever required if arriving within 6
days after leaving or transiting countries with risk of yellow
fever transmission For details, click here.

Exempt from Yellow Fever vaccination:
- Children under 9 months of age. 
- Passengers transiting countries with risk of yellow fever
  transmission provided not leaving the transit areas.
Recommended:
- For nationals of Libya and returning alien residents health
  certificates must have text translation printed in the Arab
  language.
